page.title: 01Landscape of the area
page.content:
This{D-block}is north east of Truro.It contains a commuter village,{ {Tresillian}that has a farming history ,as even today farming is still a thriving industry here.
It is a rural,picturesque area,with beautiful views of the{River Fal}and woodlands.Running through the area is the main{London-Penzance}railway and a road which is a main tourist route leading into Truro. The population is around{1,500}though it is a developing area so the population is changing rapidly.It is a mixed farming area with some hilly and some flat ground. There are{3}schools (Infant Secondary Special) in this block and a lot of this area was built during the 1800's although it is becoming more and more modernized.
